name: NumSorb
description: This game is made without a game engine. In JavaScript, CSS, HTML and Pubnub for scores. You click on enemies to absorb them, but if the enemy's number is bigger than yours, don't absorb it. Don't go too far to the edges, otherwise, you will escape the galaxy and die. You can move with a mouse click. First scores were made for playtesting and will be deleted soon. Have fun!!!
